title: Blockade
body:
Behind this wall lies a being capable of destruction beyond comprehension. Perhaps you've seen it, maybe in a dream. A nightmare. A murky, forgotten land... a place where souls are devoured as their hosts wither away. You may lose everything... but behind this wall lies a key component to your survival. A bit ironic, isn't it?
	The wall will only fall for the being who possesses the scroll. Hidden somewhere in this fortress. Seek it out or waste away in this land of fire and ash.
